text:
e="preserve">Arthur "Art" Miller Jr. (July 11, 1946 – June 25, 2020) was a Democratic politician. He was a member of the Michigan Senate from 1975 through 2002 representing a portion of Macomb County. From April 1985 through 1996, he was the Democratic leader in the chamber. Miller Jr. was born in Detroit, Michigan.
Miller Jr. died on June 25, 2020 in Royal Oak, Michigan from lung cancer at the age of 73.
